name: Seek out!
body:
Hello! "Seek out" app has been created to help people in finding lost things. The app allows to make an message-announcement on the map exactly in a place a thing  was lost. People who open a map can see the  map of lost things and they can help find particular thing if they live close to that area.


### [This is web URL for app.](http://seek-out.azurewebsites.net/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
